    • Method Detail

      • getAllStudios

        java.util.List<Studio> getAllStudios()
        Returns:
        All Studio registered in the system.

      • getStudioById

        Studio getStudioById(java.lang.String studioId)
        Parameters:
        studioId - Studio Identifier
        Returns:
        Studio if found by identifier. null if no studio has been found for the specified identifier.

      • saveStudio

        void saveStudio(Studio studio)
        Persists an Studio
        Parameters:
        studio - Entity to be persisted

      • removeStudioById

        void removeStudioById(java.lang.String studioId)
        Removes the studio with the given identifier. Do nothing if the episode does not exists in the system.
        Parameters:
        studioId - Studio Identifier

      • resetCounters

        void resetCounters()
        Reset viewing counters to zero for all studios present in the system.

      • registerViewing

        void registerViewing(java.lang.String studioId)
        Registers a new viewing on the system for the specified studio. Do nothing if studio is not present in the system
        Parameters:
        studioId - Studio Identifier
